description: Name of the warehouse group/workgroup associated with the record; likely used to segment fleet locations. Confirm exact meaning of 'wg' with SME.
Short code uniquely identifying the warehouse or mobile inventory location within the fleet.
User ID or login that created the warehouse record.
System timestamp when the warehouse record was created.
User ID or login that last modified the warehouse record.
System timestamp of the most recent update to the warehouse record.
Full descriptive name of the warehouse or vehicle-based parts location for display and reporting.
